item.description: https://www.facebook.... What's a mile race for the man we love...............it's even downhill. What I envision is at least of 100 of us dressed in our Ron Paul swag, complete with bumper stickers front and back, running our asses off for Liberty. There is always a lot of press at this event ...and it is 9 days before the primary. For those non runners, you can cheer us on and pass out information and ballons to the bystanders. To register for the race use this link: http://millenniumrun.... It's $15 to pre-register and $20 the day of the race.
item.name: Millennium Mile Race For Ron Paul
